But there's one rule that has always struck you as a little strange... and very embarrassing. Rule number 25.

Everyone under the age of eighteen must wear a diaper while inside the house. No ifs, no buts, no exceptions. Although you figured there must be an exception. That's why you felt comfortable enough to invite your classmates over for a sleepover - nothing too big, just a few classmates hanging out. And your Mum had agreed happily, so obviously it would be fine.

The night of the sleepover, you were nervous, and hoped that your friends wouldn't make fun of the fact that you were in a diaper - it was thick, and obvious under your clothes, but you were used to it. You'd never told your friends before, though, so were afraid of their reactions.

1132.content:
When Life deals out its hands you don't get much worst than mine, my parents met during an intoxicated one night stand that led to my birth, Leo Bailer, my mother was an alcoholic and my father was non-existent. Needless to say my mother kicked the bucket fairly early and I was left to fend for myself. I lived in a rundown house that I'm fairly certain was condemned several years prior, it wasn't luxurious and I wouldn't wish it on anyone. There was a rich couple in my city, they were incredibly wealthy and the wife had just given birth to a son. I saw this as my chance, if I could kidnap the baby and hold him for ransom I could finally get enough money to start my life properly. I was sixteen at the time and had gained a reputation as 'The Shadow'. No one knew who I was and I had never been caught, I blended into the background too well and didn't leave any traces. I used those skills to sneak into the house and take the baby as he was sleeping, I was pretty surprised and proud that I actually succeeded. As I was running through the night the baby must have woken up, I could feel him moving around in my arms. I looked down and received the biggest shock of my life, the baby looked up at me and smiled, he clenched close to my chest and fell back to sleep, I'm not sure why it surprised me so much but I expected him to be afraid of me, I was a man who he had never seen before. I brought him back to my house and sat him down, he was awake again and looked at me with his large blue eyes, I felt bad dragging him into this mess, he had done nothing wrong, just a victim of circumstance, at least he wouldn't be able to remember it. Several days later sent the ransom note. I set up a meeting place within seeing distance of my base of operations. I asked for a decently large sum that I could use to get on my feet. I waited along with the baby, days turned into weeks and weeks eventually turned into months, I was starting to get worried, there was no news from the couple, they didn't make an appearance or try to get in contact to negotiate, heck, there wasn't even any police around the meeting area like I had suspected there to be, there was nothing. I looked down at the baby, I felt horrible for him, sure, the amount of money I asked for was insane by my standards but the couple was so rich they could have paid it five times over with absolutely no repercussions, did their son really mean so little to them that they couldn't even be bothered to pay the fine to get him back? It wasn't until four months had passed that I learnt to truth. I was wondering down the dark alleyway with my loot when I found an old newspaper, apparently the couple was murdered the night before my ransom note arrived to them, I felt even worse for the child as I read the article. I traveled back home where the kid had been waiting for me, he crawled over and looked up at me with his giant blue eyes, I couldn't help but feel horrible. My first idea was to send him to an orphanage, allow him to be raised somewhat decently, but he was considered dead to the world, he would have no identity and would be preyed upon his entire life. My second choice was to kill him, to spare him the hell he would need to go through in his life, but looking down at him, I couldn't do it, I couldn't kill the boy, he was innocent. I hated myself, the one things I didn't want to happen did, I grew feelings for him, I loved the little boy with all my heart. I collapsed to the ground and sighed heavily, I had no idea what to do, I was in way over my head. The baby crawled over to me and touched my arm, the next thing that happened blew me away, I was so overwhelmed with emotion I think I cried for hours.
"D-dada," he announced, this broke me, I wasn't the boy's father, I had taken him away from his father and now he would never be able to see him again, I was no father, I was a monster. I continued to cry with the boy sitting next to me, eventually I managed to calm myself down, I looked over to the boy and noticed his diaper looking pretty full. I picked him up and walked him over to the table.
"Let's have a look at the damage should we?" I cooed.

11321.content:
Griffin watched as his father disappeared into the night. Leo had kidnapped Griffin in order to have a better life, in a way that did end up happening, after promising to take care of Griffin and give him the life he could never had Leo worked harder and sneakier to steal small things that wouldn't be missed but that he could sell for a lot. By the time Griffin had turned three Leo had enough money to move them both to a small apartment in the city, it wasn't much but Griffin loved it. Once settled in Leo became a hired hand, he did jobs for other people in exchange for money, the tasks could range from cleaning a bathroom to finding information of someone. At night he did more undercover missions that involved breaking the law. He was fairly good and received enough money to life comfortably with Griffin, despite the number of diapers the boy somehow managed to go through in a single day. As all children do, it wasn't long until Griffin started to imitate Leo, at first it was fine, he first imitated Leo's stance that he used when he was bored, he would stand with his arm crossed and an exaggerated lean to the left side of his hip, his right foot would be pointed off to the side and his face would show utter annoyance, Griffin started doing it at the age of five except he made a pouty face, it was the cutest thing Leo had ever seen. unfortunately the imitation didn't stop there and Griffin started doing some things that he shouldn't have been, such as swearing and stealing, that's when Leo came up with his punishment system. Everything Griffin did wrong would be considered in two categories, Morally Wrong and Physically Wrong. For example, swearing would be a ten Morally Wrong rating but wouldn't class as Physically Wrong, while stealing would be a seven on the Morally Wrong scale and a ten on the Physically Wrong scale. Morally Wrong scores would be delivered as padded spanks, in which Griffin kept his diaper on, while Physically Wrong scores would be delivered as bare spanks, where his diaper was pulled off and he was spanked on the bare bottom. When Griffin was younger the score was halved by 2 and rounded down to the nearest whole number and that would be the number of spanks he would receive, after he turned ten the numbers were no longer halved but any incident that was less than five padded spanks, like saying Crap for instance, would only deliver a warning. All bare spanks were issued, even if it was only one. The spanks were never hard, in fact Leo would be surprised if they hurt at all, it was more the idea that Griffin was spanked that seemed to get the message across more than the spanks themselves.

Griffin sat on the couch and decided to watch some TV, there was a show he absolutely adored that was running old episodes, Griffin was so consumed by the show that he didn't feel the front of his diaper warm up and sag. After several of the episodes had passed Griffin managed to lift his eyes from the TV and saw the time 11: 30. Griffin almost jumped when he spotted the time, he was up really late, he was surprised his father hadn't come back yet, he quickly turned off all of the lights and TV and dived into bed, falling asleep soon after.

Leo was in the kitchen cooking breakfast for the two of them, he saw Griffin enter and waved to him.
"How's my little stinker this morning?" he asked, "sleep well?" Griffin looked down at the ground sad.
"Dad, I have to tell you something," Griffin informed, Leo stopped what he was doing and walked over to Griffin. "I stayed up until 11:30," Griffin revealed, "I was watching shows and didn't notice the time."
"Well thank you for telling me," Leo replied, "come on, let's eat." Griffin sat down and the two started eating. Omelettes were Griffin's favourite, he loved to eat them and loved when his father cooked them. After they were finished Leo cleaned up and met Griffin in the bathroom to change him, he cleaned the boy up before sitting him up. "Since you came clean about last night you won't be getting any padded spanks," Leo informed, "but staying up late is bad for you and you should keep a closer eye on the time so you'll have six bare spanks, ok." Griffin nodded as he laid over Leo's lap. Griffin sobbed slightly as his butt was being spanked, they didn't hurt much, just light taps at best, but it was the fact that every spank meant Griffin wasn't the man his father wanted him to be, he was more ashamed and disappointed in himself than even Leo, Leo was never disappointed in Griffin, he knew it was all apart of growing up, but Griffin wanted to please his father, and spanks meant he wasn't. When Leo was finished he diapered Griffin and hugged him tightly. "Remember that I will always love you, no matter how many spanks you get."
"I love you too dad!" Griffin replied, hugging him just as tightly.
"It's Saturday, what movie should we watch?" Leo asked.
"Can we have popcorn too?" Griffin asked, excited.
"I think we still have some," Leo replied with a smile.

When Griffin was seven years old Leo decided to tell him the truth about his parents, about how he was just a thief who stole him as a baby. After hearing the truth Griffin began to cry heavily and Leo's heart shattered into a million pieces, he knew that he would never be loved by the boy again and that he would have to live with that distain, he loved Griffin more than anything in the world, the fact that the boy would never love him back broke Leo inside. It was then that Griffin did something Leo didn't suspect, he was good at that. He jumped up and hugged Leo tightly, still crying.
"Thank you," he cried, "thank you for being my dad." Even Leo was crying at that point, Griffin couldn't imagine anyone else as his father and he was crying over the fact that he could have never even known Leo if things went differently. Their relationship only seemed to improve by that point and Leo was pretty proud to say that he very rarely had to get angry at Griffin, most of the times that Griffin was spanked was because of his ignorance and not knowing if something was wrong or because he was being playfully cheeky and wanted to see how much spankings he would get for more obscure naughty deeds, like shitting in the kiddies pool without a diaper on.

"Hey dad," Griffin interrupted, leaning on the man's arm. Leo turned to his son, who blushed slightly. "I need a diaper change, badly." Leo nodded and paused the movie, he walked with Griffin to the bathroom and pulled off the diaper, gagging as he did so.
"What did I put in that omelette?" Leo asked, dramatically gasping for air. Griffin laughed so much he began to pee. "I knew you wouldn't be finished," Leo smiled. He cleaned his son and re-diapered him before they finished the movie. After the movie was finished Griffin hugged his father tightly.
"What's this for?" Leo asked with a large smile.
"Nothing, just want to hug you dad," Griffin replied.
"I'm sure," Leo replied sceptically, "so where did you want to go then?" Leo knew Griffin was manipulative, he would spank him if he wasn't so proud of the boy because of this, Griffin knew exactly what to do to get what he wanted, he learnt pretty quickly that hugging him was one of the easiest ways to either calm Leo down if he was angry or get him to do something if he was in a good mood. It wasn't until he turned ten though that he figured out why hugging him did that. After he figured out it was because Leo never got the chance to hug his parents Griffin was so sad that he spent the next week almost constantly hugging the man. Leo caught on to Griffin's manipulative ways but couldn't do anything about it, whenever Griffin hugged him he felt so happy that he could show his son love that Griffin had him practically wrapped around his finger.
"Well since you're offering," Griffin replied with a cheeky grin.

114332.content:
Jason jumped the fence, hearing the police sirens blaring behind him, he quickly changed direction and ran up a separate alleyway. He reached the dead end and jumped up to grab the fire escape before climbing up to the roof, he jumped from rooftop to rooftop for several hundred meters before climbing back down to the ground and running off, hearing the sirens far away, he smiled, contempt with the fact that he managed to outrun the cops again. His thoughts were interrupted as he ran straight into a man and fell to the ground, he looked up to see a man wearing a police outfit. He pouted as he was pushed into the cop car and driven away.

"When I know a boy by name you know something's wrong Jason," a man informed as he sat at the other side of the table, "you'll be eighteen soon, which means you'll have to face real jail."
"You only caught me because I let my guard down," Jason informed, "I promise it won't happen again." The man sighed, he pinched the bridge of his nose and grabbed a file.
"I know you Jason," the man informed, "through the years you've been here I know you aren't a bad kid, you're kind and thoughtful, you show that all the time, so why do you need to steal?"
"It's not like anyone's was going to miss it," Jason rolled his eyes, "it was a dusty, old console at the bottom of a draw in a store room."
"That's not the point," the man replied, "stealing is against the law, it doesn't matter what you steal. You may have given up on yourself but I haven't, I know you can be good, but I have no choice but to send you to Juvenile Detention."
"So what? They adore me there," Jason scoffed. The man smiled.
"You'll be surprised how much has changed since you were there," the man replied. The man stood up and walked towards the door. "Well let's get you over there."
"Don't I need my clothes?" Jason asked, also getting up.
"Oh, you won't have to worry about that," the man left the room and Jason followed him, uninterested. He entered the car and the man drove off, about an hour later they arrived at the Juvi, from the outside it looked exactly the same, a single, featureless building with no personality, and he was certain the inside was just the same.

The man parked the car and let Jason out, he walked the boy up to the entrance. They walked into the reception area and the man left Jason to hand in the report, Jason may have been a street rat but he never tried escaping after he was caught, he found it futile and too much effort. The man even started trusting him by himself because of this. In a few minutes the man returned and walked Jason down the grey halls, he was right, just as plain and dirty as always, he honestly didn't know what the difference between this and jail would be. They reached the door into the main room but before they opened the door the man stopped.
"I should warn you," the man spoke, "you really aren't going to like it here."
"And why would that be?" Jason asked, completely uninvested in the conversation.
"They've decided on a new method of rehabilitation," the man informed.
"This should be good," Jason replied, rolling his eyes.
"You'd want to think so, otherwise you're going to have a painful time," the man responded. He opened the door and light flooded into Jason's eyes. As he was blinded the first thing he could sense was a distinctive smell.

1143331.content:
You placed the last box down in your room before sighing heavily and falling onto your bed, you were completely exhausted. You had recently moved houses, there was a little brother on the way and your family needed a bigger house, you didn't move far, literally a flew blocks away so it didn't change anything about your life, except for you know being practically right next door to your best friend, which was a bonus.
"Can I have some help with these boxes?" you heard your mum call from the hallway. You jumped to your feet and walked to your mum, she gestured to a dusty old box and you picked it up.
"What's in here?" you asked, noticing the surprisingly heavy feel of the box.
"Just antiques," your mum replied, "can you pace them in the attic?" you walked away as your mum continued doing her own thing. The cool thing about this new house was that the attic was big enough to enter, it was like a room, you had only ever seen attics like it in movies so to be able to enter the creepy attic was awesome! As you pondered for a place to put the box the bottom gave way and all the items dropped out, some landing on your foot, to which you quickly recoiled. You groaned as you knelt down to pick up the fallen items. Your mum wasn't kidding, the box really was filled with old junk, stuff like metal cups and candlesticks, there was even an old Swiss box iron. There was one item, however, that caught your attention, it was bronze and shaped like the typical genie lamp like in Aladdin. You picked it up by the handle and inspected it, upon closer inspection you determined that it wasn't made of bronze, the metal was a much lighter gold colour. Deciding to amuse yourself you gently rubbed side of the lamp, you waited for a second but no genie came out. Oddly disappointed you placed the lamp with the rest of the items back in the box and picked it up. As you walked to where you had decided to place the box a boy appeared in a puff of blue smoke.
"So sorry I took so long!" he apologised. Hearing the sudden voice behind you, you jumped and accidentally dropped the box again, you turned around to see the genie, he was surprisingly young, appearing about fourteen, with blue hair and clothes similar to the character Aladdin from the Disney movie of that name. "I was honestly so excited that someone had rubbed my lamp I freaked out a bit." You stared their dumbfounded at the boy, did a genie seriously come out of the lamp? No, that couldn't be possible.
"I think I need to get dad to check out the carbon monoxide levels up here," you say to yourself.
"Hey, I'm not a hallucination!" the genie snapped, clearly offended. He clicked his fingers and the fallen objects returned to the box, all except the lamp that returned to your hands. "I'm the real deal, Omar the great!" He looked you up and down before nodding. "So, seventeen years old, allergic to oysters, B Grade student, scared of thunder, got it!" you stepped back, taken aback slightly at his sudden extensive knowledge of you.
"So you really are a genie?" you asked for confirmation, "like full-blown grant any three wishes genie?"
"Three wishes?" Omar asked, "who told you that?" you cocked an eyebrow at the boy.
"So you don't grant three wishes?" you asked.
"I can grant much more than that!" Omar informed, "my magic is infinite, I can grant as many wishes as I like! So, do you have any wish for me to grant master?" You though for a moment, you could ask for literally anything, but you couldn't have it too extreme, people would be bound to notice.
"How about changing my clothes to look cooler?" you asked, Omar nodded.
"Ok, something simple to start off with!" he cheered, he raised his left hand before pointing it at you, a blast of blue light shot towards you before you were engulfed in its light. You slowly open your eyes as look down at yourself.
1143331.title: SO...You Grant Wishes?

11433313.content:
You look down at yourself in confusion, you're still wearing your white shirt with long yellow sleeves along with grey slacks and white sneakers. Omar chuckled nervously as you looked towards him, scratching the back of his head.
"I guess you can't get any cooler than you are now?" he suggested. You cocked an eyebrow at him, finally he sighed. "Ok, so I might have lied about the whole 'the great' thing. I'm a new genie, you're actually my first ever master."
"Wait, if I'm your first master why is your lamp owned by my parents?" you asked, Omar and his powers weren't making any sense.
"Well technically I've been a genie for millions of years, but I recently reached the end of my life and was reborn, which is why I look like this," Omar explained.
"So you need to re-learn how to use your powers?" you inquired.
"Yeah, sorry," he apologised.
"It's ok, I guess I should be honoured that I get to help a genie learn to you their power," you replied, seeing Omar's face light up. You headed downstairs and placed the lamp on your bedside table before walking down the hall with Omar following you. "Are you going to follow me everywhere?"
"Well you are my master after all," Omar replied, "it's only natural."
"Ok, but what if you're seen?" you asked.
"You're the only person who can see or hear me," Omar informed.
"If you say so," you replied.
"Who are you talking to?" your mum asked as she passed you in the hall.
"Myself," you lied, before walking into the lounge room.
"Should I be concerned that she doesn't think you talking to yourself is weird?" Omar asked, looking down the hall as you mum continued into her room
"People talk to themselves a lot more than they realise," you replied before sitting down on the couch. Omar shrugged before sitting down next to you. "Shouldn't you be practicing or something?"
"I only just woke up," Omar reminded, "give me some time to rest."
"Ok, but I kind of want my wishes soon," you admitted.
"You'll get them soon enough, don't worry," Omar assured you. The rest of the day went smoothly, watched Tv for the next few hours before eating dinner, you noticed as you got up from the couch that your started feeling dizzy, brushing off as a random dizzy spell you composed yourself before heading to the kitchen. When you were finished eating you returned to watching TV.
"Hey Omar, do you ever find having a master boring?" you asked, opting to get to know your genie a bit more.
"Not really," Omar replied, "some master's are really interesting and being a genie I don't get to see anything unless I'm summoned by a master."
"I guess that makes sense," you agreed, "what do you like anyway? Sport, or comics?"
"I don't really have anything I like," Omar informed, "I like everything, Genies are different to humans, we think differently and have different emotions."
"Ok Time for bed!" you heard your mum announce from the kitchen. You looked towards the kitchen door quizzically.
"Wait, since when do I have a bed time?" you asked.
"Do I need to repeat myself?" your mum asked. You look over to Omar, who simply shrugged. You turned off the TV and headed to your room, you didn't want to defy your mum and you were pretty tired anyway.
"Do genies actually sleep?" you asked as you undressed yourself.
"I guess you could call it sleeping," Omar replied, "I'll see you in the morning." With that he retreated into the lamp.
"Today was crazy," you announced as you fell back on your bed, tomorrow was going to be big as you had to sort all of your boxed stuff. You turned onto your side before quickly falling to sleep.

"Keep your eyes peeled," Kaldur ordered, "If Batman thinks she will then there's a good chance she will." Wally sighed and looked over to Robin, the boy was completely till, focusing on nothing other than what he was looking at through his binoculars. Suddenly, Robin let out a muffled fart as the pull up expanded, the boy was shaken from his focus as he looked down at himself.
"Seriously dude?" Wally asked, "There's such a thing as too focused."
"What's wrong you two?" Artemis asked. Wally winced, forgetting that the others could hear his thoughts.
"It's nothing, I just fell out of the tree is all," Robin replied. "Nice going kid mouth."
"Well we need to get you changed," Wally informed, the two stopped as a hissing sound emitted from Robin's pull-up.
"I see Poison Ivy!" Superboy informed.
"On my way!" Artemis replied.
"Robin, Kid Flash, stay in position and keep a watch for any other villains coming," Miss Martian suggested.
"No problem babe," Wally replied, "looks like we have time to change that pull-up of yours.

Ever since his parents died and Dick became Robin he had always had a desire to go back to a time when he didn't have any responsibilities and didn't have to fight crime all the time. This desire soon manifested itself in the form of diapers, Dick purposefully wet the bed every night so that Bruce put him in diapers to sleep, after that he would secretly wear them during the day as well. Dick guarded the secret with his life but unfortunately Wally was able to figure it out during a sleep over. He had noticed Dick making rustling sounds when he moved and ticked him into revealing his diapers. To Dick's surprise the speedster actually thought Dick was cute in his diapers and started to baby him. Bruce discovered eventually, or at least Dick noticed that he had discovered, he had probably known since the beginning, he was Batman after all. Soon the games they played became more permanent as Dick started to need diapers after his bowel and bladder muscles had deteriorated from never working them, that only seemed to bring Wally and Dick closer together. They kept it very secret, one because it was weird, even they had to admit that, and Wally didn't want to risk embarrassing Dick. Unfortunately for them though neither of the boys are any good at being careful, one night while they had the whole cave to themselves they sat in the lounge and watched a movie together, Dick was snuggled up to Wally in nothing but a diaper. The next morning Miss Martian entered the cave to see the two boys asleep on the couch, Dick's diaper visible and clearly used, she put them to bed before anyone else could see them and decided to do research on it, seeing as diapers were something she had never heard of before. After realising how embarrassed Dick would be if the others found out she decided to help the boys by making sure the others don't find out. She worked without the boys knowing that she knew their secret, she would lock doors if they left them open and make sure to put them to bed if they ever dosed off in a place they could be seen, like Wally's bedroom. At first she did find it unusual since she didn't vision Dick as the type of person to participate in the so-called 'diaper fetish' but as time went on and she continued to watch over the boys from the shadows she started thinking it was really cute how they interacted with each other.

"That was a hellish mission," Robin complained as he pulled a spike from his costume. "Poison Ivy and The Floronic man."
"Well, at least there was no evil Swamp Thing as well," Wally smirked. Robin rolled his eyes.
"I'm hitting the showers," Artemis informed as she walked out of the room.
"I'm getting out of my costume," Zatanna announced, "it needs a wash."
"Yeah, I should go 'change' too," Robin added, looking at Wally.
"We should all freshen up," Kaldur agreed. The group walked to their own rooms, Wally followed Dick into his room, when they got there Dick fell onto his bed, completely exhausted. He waited as Wally stripped him down before slipping the boy wonder into his larger diaper.
"Sorry Dickie but I can't sleep with you tonight," Wally informed, "Artemis would get suspicious if I'm watching movies with you two nights in a row." Wally leaned down and planted a kiss on Dick's forehead. Dick looked up at Wally with a pouty face, missing him already.
"Are you sure you can't?" he asked.
"Not tonight little guy," Wally replied sadly, "but don't worry we have the whole day tomorrow, don't forget that..."
1411132.title: Exclusive Secret

14112.content:
The first time the team noticed the night terrors was the first night they decided to have a "sleepover". Sure, they'd all slept in the tower together plenty of times - but it was always in their own rooms.

Dick had been apprehensive the whole night, sneaking off to the bathroom to hide every hour, and offering to get people energy drinks, or coffees, and always coming back with one for them and one for himself. They noticed that he was fighting sleep, but assumed it was because he wanted to have fun with them all night, rather than anything serious.

So when he woke up screaming for his parents in the early hours of the morning it was more than a little bit of a shock for them.

"Dick? Dude?" Wally panicked, rushing over to grab his friend's shoulder. "Dude, wake up -- oh, ew." He wrinkled his nose, but decided to ignore the mess that had caused his brief distraction.

"Should I try to wake him up?" M'Gann floated close by behind Wally, watching Dick cautiously.
14112.title: Regression Therapy

choices: "His real name is Dick Grayson, son of Bruce Wayne."
"I made a promise to keep it a secret."
"All we need to know is he needs our help."
141121.content:
Wally looked over to Dick, who continued to scream in agony and terror. He looked over at M'gann and nodded solemnly. He was hesitant about M'gann diving into Dick's mind, he had a good idea what the night terror was about and if M'gann read his mind it would reveal his secret identity, but he couldn't let Dick suffer any longer, Dick's identity wasn't worth the pain he was experiencing. M'gann floated towards Robin and placed her hands on the side of his head, suddenly her eyes began to glow, as did the boy wonders, a moment later M'gann was propelled backwards, everyone looked over to her, she was completely motionless, eyes wide as if she had seen a ghost, a stream of tears escaped her eyes as she continued to stare into nothingness. Wally bit his lip and grabbed onto Dick's screaming form.
"Dick, Dick, it's me, Wally," the speedster pleaded, "listen to me, focus on my voice." Everyone watched in amazement, they were all banking on Miss M's telepathy to snap Robin out of his dream but when that didn't work they had lost hope, Wally continued to talk in a surprisingly soothing voice, he recounted events that he remembered alongside the bird, in and out of costume. Suddenly, Dick's eyes closed and his screams stopped, a second later he slowly opened his eyes.
"W-Wally?" Dick asked, groggily coming into consciousness.
"Yes, Yes, it's me," Wally cheered, as he hugged the boy tightly, ignoring the moist feeling around the boy's crotch.
"Robin, what happened?" Zatanna asked, concern dripping from her face.
"You gave me a heart attack," Wally informed as he gripped the boy tighter, tears in his eyes.
"I saw, a circus, acrobats, blood, so much blood," M'gann recalled, trying to shake off her vision. Everyone looked towards Dick with confused and concerned expressions. Dick and Wally shared a glance before Dick sighed.
"I've been having Night Terrors," Dick informed, "about my parent's death."
"How long?" Kaldur asked. Dick took a deep breath before sighing.
"Five years," Dick replied, Wally gasped.
"But, that's..." He went to say.
"How long my parents have been dead," Dick finished, "I know."
"Why didn't you tell me?" Wally asked.
"Forget that, why didn't you tell anyone!" Artemis added. Dick looked down at the ground.
"I couldn't," Dick replied, "I didn't want to inconvenience any of you."
"YOU IDIOT!" Wally shouted, much to everyone's surprise. Everyone looked on as Wally began visually shaking. "All those years, all those years you've been suffering and I WASN'T THERE!" Tears were forming Dick's eyes as Wally shouted. "I WASN'T ABLE TO PROTECT YOU, I FAILED YOU!" Dick broke down crying and fell into Wally's arms.
"I'm sorry," he cried, "I-I can't handle it anymore, I can still hear their screams, see the terror on their faces. Please Wally, don't let me go back, I can't fall asleep every again, I need you to protect me." Everyone else in the room could do little more than stare at what was happening before them, they were far to confused, Robin had never acted this way before, and out of everyone he could have pleaded to pleaded to Wally?

"So, what are we going to do about Robin?" Artemis asked the group, Dick had gone to take a bath to clean up and the group moved to the briefing room to talk. Wally kept his eyes fixed on the table below him, he was devastated for Dick.
"Seeing him like that," Zatanna shivered, "I know how it feels to lose your parents, but to watch them die? Even in my worst nightmares I couldn't experience the trauma he must be feeling."
"When I tapped into his mind, I felt everything he was feeling for a second," Miss M informed, "Compared to that, Failsafe was nothing more than not getting the toy you wanted from Bat Burger." Everyone shuttered at M'gann's comment.
"We need to do something," Kaldur decided, "we can't let Robin suffer any longer."
"But to help him we need to know more about him then just acrobats and blood," Artemis reasoned, everyone turned to Wally. "Earlier you called him Dick, you know more about him than any of us, we need to know." Wally winced as he felt the glares on him.
141121.title: Time To Come Clean

choices: "Do you really think that will work?"
"Treat me like a baby? No Way!"
"If you're ok with it then so am I."
1411213.content:
"Wally's right," Superboy piped up, surprising the group. Everyone turned to look at the large teen. "With or without the costume, Robin is our friend, I'm sure as hell not going to sit around and do nothing while he's reliving the most traumatic moment of his life every night." The group smiled and nodded at Conner, for someone so emotionally detached and hot-headed as Conner he could be really sweat.
"But the problem remains on how we are to help him," Kaldur spoke, "trauma like his won't be fixed by seeing a therapist."
"Maybe we could try hypnotising him," Zatanna suggested.
"Batman would have trained him against hypnotism," Artemis reasoned, "if we want to help him we need to find a way so absurd that Batman wouldn't have thought to train Robin against it."
"You're asking us to think of something BATMAN couldn't think of?" M'gann asked, "that's not an easy feat."
"There's got to be something," Artemis replied, "what about you're telepathy?"
"I already tried that," M'gann reminded, "and besides, Batman would have a counter measure for my uncle, I'm not as strong as he is." Wally watched the others discuss before meekly speaking.
"Well...I may have one method, but it's sort of weird," he informed.
"That's kind of what we're going for here," Artemis reminded, "what is it?"
"The way I see it, the best way to stop his trauma is to regress his mind, if we can stimulate his childhood it would hopefully end his trauma by creating a different perception of childhood," Wally explained.
"So how do we do that?" M'gann asked, "we already established that my powers won't work."
"No, this is an old fashion form of brainwashing, one that can't be protected against," Wally informed, "we need to treat him like a baby, diaper, baby food, the lot." The room was eerily quiet for about a minute.
"That actually has a chance of working," Artemis agreed, "I don't even want to know how you came across that but it would work."
"Hold up, you suggest we treat Robin like a baby, a REAL baby?" Zatanna asked, "let's ignore the fact that NONE of us have experience raising kids, what would make Robin agree to do this?"
"You saw him earlier," Artemis replied, "he was broken, Robin smart, if there's a chance this will help him he'll agree."
"But wouldn't this be a better job for Batman?" M'gann asked. Both Kaldur and Wally looked away for a moment in pain.
"No," Kaldur firmly said, "I can't explain, but Batman is the worst person to take on this role."
"Robin may not seem like it but his relationship with Batman is shaky," Wally added.
"Ok, so we're doing this?" Conner asked, "we'll need baby furniture in Robin's size, as well as food clothing and other instruments." Kaldur raised an eyebrow at Conner as he seemed to take charge of the situation, he never expected him to be able to lead so well.
"I can worry about the clothing," M'gann offered.
"Zee and I can get all the necessities," informed.
"Kaldur and I will find the furniture then," Conner then turned to Wally. "Wally, we need you to try and convince Robin into doing this."
"Wait, why me?" Wally asked.
"Because it was your idea?" Artemis offered.
"Robin trusts you more than any of us," M'gann informed, "I see it every time I enter his head, you're like a big brother to him." Wally was startled slightly, did Dick really see him as a big brother?
"Ok," Wally agreed, "but we need the best for Dick, I'll talk to Batman and get him on board with this idea, we can use his money to pay for everything."
"Are you sure Batman will be ok with this?" M'gann asked.
"If he's not I'll force him to," Wally replied, the others could tell he wasn't joking, the determination in his eyes was almost overwhelming.
"Before we split up I need to ask," Artemis gained everyone's attention. "Is Dick really his name?" Wally mentally slapped himself, he hadn't realised he was using his real name this whole time, he supposed the shock of seeing Dick in such a state made his brotherly instincts kick in and superhero titles became void.
"It's a nickname," Wally sighed, "I guess with the amount of times I must have shouted it earlier it would matter keeping it secret." After the group disbanded to do their jobs Wally met Robin on the couch, he was still sniffling from what had happened, not only did he have the night terror again but everyone saw him, he had WET HIS PANTS in front of everyone.
"Hey buddy, how's it going?" Wally asked softly as he sat down next to him, Dick didn't respond, he was too embarrassed to look at Wally. Wally pulled the boy wonder towards his chest and started to rub his head soothingly. "It's ok, everything that happened, wasn't your fault, we love you Dick and we want to help." This time Dick did respond, he started to sob lightly in Wally's arms.
"I don't know what to do Wally," Dick admitted, "I'm supposed to be the independent and experienced sidekick, but now I'm nothing but a pants wetting crybaby."
"Being independent isn't always a good thing," Wally replied, "we've all talked and we want to help you out."
"How? Batman's taken me to therapy, it won't work," Dick replied, starting to tear up.
"I've thought of something that might work but we need you to be ok with it," Wally informed.
"What is it?" Dick asked, Wally hugged the boy tightly.
"Before I tell you remember, no matter what you do, wear or think, you will always be my best friend, I will never leave your side and I will never think of you any less than awesome," Wally informed. There was a moments pause before he continued. "We're thinking about using Regression Therapy, we want to treat you like a baby."
1411213.title: Game Plan

14112133.content:
There was a slight moment of hesitation from Dick, was Wally seriously considering putting him in diapers? However, after hearing the conviction in Wally's voice about wanting to hep him, Dick had no choice.
"Ok," he whispered, "if you're ok with it then so am I." Wally smiled as the two continued to watch TV for a little while longer.
"So, we really going to do this?" Zatanna asked, still not completely sure it was a good idea.
"I talked to Batman, he's agreed to pay for all the expenses and has suspended all of our missions until we're finished," Wally explained, "he also gave me a phone number to ring if we ever needed help, said it belonged to The Butler? Whoever that is."
"He's one of Batman's detective associates," Dick lied, assuming 'The Butler' to be Alfred.
"Mt. Justice is also now off limits to anyone besides us," Wally informed.
"Wow, how did you convince Batman to allow all of that?" Superboy asked. Wally expression suddenly became very serious.
"Because I would do anything for my best friend," Wally replied, showing a rather convincing version of the Bat-Glare.
"Ok, I did research into regression therapy," Artemis interrupted, "you're going to feel utterly humiliated to start off with Dick." Dick sighed at Artemis using his real name, he supposed with all that happened it couldn't be avoided.
"How much do they know?" Dick asked.
"Just that nickname," Wally replied, "they know absolutely nothing else." Dick sighed in relief, at least his secret identity was still intact.
"In order for it to work we need to start off small, so just the diaper for now," Artemis paused for a minute. "Um, does anyone actually know how to diaper a teenager?"
"And hence we reach our first roadblock," Zatanna muses, "didn't think we'd be calling The Butler so soon."
"Well...actually, I know how to change diapers,"
14112133.title: Desired Isolation

141121332.content:
Everyone turned to Conner, their expressions a mixture of surprise and confusion.
"The genomes taught me all about child care when I was in that pod," he explained, "I can diaper him." Robin took a step back, getting second thoughts about this regression therapy.
"Are you sure I can't diaper myself?" Dick asked, "I'm a quick learner."
"Robin, we want to help you," M'gann reminded, "everything will be taken care of, please let us do this for you." Dick hesitated for a second before giving in.
"Ok, can...can everyone else at least leave the room?" Dick asked, the others agreed and soon the only two people were Conner and Dick.
"You sure you're ready to do this?" Conner asked. After everyone had left the room they decided to set up, they would give Dick the day to get used to the diaper before properly starting the regression. All the baby furniture was set up and the supplies were put in place. Seeing as Wally was the only one able to sooth Dick's night terror the baby crib was set up in his room, which he had no argument against.
"I can't believe this is happening," Dick whimpered as he laid down on a bench without his pants on, he had his hands covering his exposed crotch while Conner went to grab the baby powder.
"I can't diaper you with your hands there," Conner informed, Dick bit his lip, not able to move his hands away due to the embarrassment. Conner sighed and carefully pushed Dick's hands aside before applying the powder and cream, Dick's face shined brighter than a stop light as Conner lifted his butt up and slid the incredibly large diaper underneath. Dick was completely dumbfounded, Conner was the strongest member of the team, and yet he diapered the boy with such gentleness and care, Dick felt amazed at his skill. "Ok, all done."
"T-Thank you," Dick stuttered as he was helped up, the diaper was incredibly think and crinkled loudly whenever he made even the slightest movement. Dick looked down at himself in just the large diaper, it was killing him. "Where are some clothes to put over the top of this?" Suddenly the door flung open and the entire team walked in, Dick shrieked as he hid desperately behind Conner, Artemis snickered at the sight of Robin cowering behind Conner like a timid child, it was adorable.
"You look super cute!" Wally cheered as he raced over to Dick and held him up into the air, Dick looked away as tears formed in his eyes, he couldn't look at his friend not like this. Wally placed the boy on the ground. "Hey, it's ok Dick, look I got you something, specially ordered." Wally pulled out a large Kid Flash Onesie out of the bag next to him, Dick couldn't help but laugh at the fact that Wally specially ordered a teen sized onesie of himself. Wally smiled at Dick's short outburst of laughter. "I also got you this," Wally tone had changed, it wasn't as goofy anymore, it was serious, but more like loving, he was genuine. Dick almost chocked when he saw Wally pull out a stuffed elephant with a blue rug on.
"I-Is that?" Dick was speechless.
"Yep, got it from Haly himself," Wally informed, "it's a stuffed toy of Eli." Dick broke down crying as he hugged the toy tightly, the others weren't sure what was going on but they looked on as the Dick cried tears of joy.

Afterwards Wally managed to dress Dick, no matter how much the boy protested and things seemed to go pretty normal, Wally showed Dick everything they had changed while everyone was finishing off what needed to be done. As Wally walked into the lounge room with Dick he noticed him squirming a bit.
"Are you ok dude?" he asked, Dick looked at him for a moment before answering.
"I really need to take a piss," Dick informed.
"Well then, take a piss," Wally replied, "that's what diapers were made for." Dick looked at Wally with disgust but soon shook off that feeling, he guessed it was unavoidable. "If it would help, I'll give you some privacy." With that Wally had sped out of the room, Dick smiled at Wally and tried to relax himself, he took in a deep breath and held it in until he could hear the diaper crinkling and the warm sensation around his crotch, he turned beetroot red by the time he was finished, he looked down at the diaper, through his onesie it wasn't overly obvious he had wet himself.
"You feeling ok?" Dick jumped as he heard Conner's booming voice, he turned to see the boy standing in the doorway, Dick was mortified, was Conner there when he peed himself. "Wally said you might need a diaper change."
"What? No, I'm completely clean!" Dick lied frantically as he took a step back. Conner sighed.
"Robin, please don't be like this, you're my friend, you helped save me from Cadmus and I love you, let me save you from your night terrors, I don't care of I see you naked, you soiling yourself won't make me think any less of you," Conner spoke sincerely. Dick whimpered for a moment before nodding. Conner walked up to him and picked him up like a baby.
"Hey, put me down!" Dick protested.
"You can barely walk in a clean diaper," Conner reminded, which shut Dick up. Conner was right, it was nearly impossible to walk with the giant diaper on, Dick was forced to waddle around, which only added to his embarrassment. Conner laid Dick down and began unstrapping the diaper. "Completely clean hey?" Conner asked with a smirk, holding up the completely soaked diaper. Dick blushed as Conner continued to diaper him. The rest of the day was fairly uneventful, Dick was both dreading and excited for the next day, it was an experience he had never experienced and he would be lying if he said he wasn't curious about how the regression therapy would work out. At last it was time to sleep and Dick happily slept in his bed for the last night for at least the next few weeks. Suddenly though visions of his parents flooded his mind, he was in a graveyard and saw them rise from the ground, the rotting corpses creeping towards him.
GASP!
Dick jolted awake after the dream he had, he was breathing heavily and although he didn't register it at first his diaper was wet. Tears formed in his eyes as he scampered up and walked into Wally's room. The boy grunted in his sleep as Dick approached.
"Dick, is that you?" he asked groggily after being woken up, "is everything ok?"
141121332.title: Baby Steps

1411213321.content:
Wally yawned loudly before sitting up, he looked over at Dick, scanning him, he was in nothing but the diaper, due to not having any clothes big enough to fit over it, and had visible tears in his eyes, it was all too obvious he had been crying.
"Dick, are you ok?" Wally asked, moving to the side of the bed and placing his hands on Dick's shoulders.
"I had another nightmare," Dick informed, looking at the ground solemnly, "the graveyard one. My parents, they...they..." Tears started rolling down Dick's face as he recounted to events in his nightmare, Wally pulled the boy into a hug and rubbed his head soothingly.
"Shh, it will be ok," he hushed, "you're safe now, you're parents aren't going to become zombies while I'm here." Dick's crying lightened up as he looked up at his best friend, "now, come on, you can sleep with me tonight."
"Thanks Wally," Dick smiled as he laid next to the red-haired boy, Wally placed an arm protectively over Dick as the younger boy curled up into his friend.

The next day Dick woke up and looked around to see that Wally was no longer in the room, he walked out and saw everyone convening in the lounge room. Seeing everyone turn to look at him suddenly made Dick self conscious about the fact that he was in a wet diaper. Conner carried Dick to another room to change before re joining the group.
"Ok pal, you ready to really get started?" Wally asked, half gleeful about what was to come and half wanting to ensure Dick was completely fine with it before continuing. Dick nodded to his friend.
"Let's just get this over and done with I suppose," Dick replied, by this point he would do almost anything to stop his nightmares.
"Well then it's time for the rules that you need to follow," Artemis informed, "Rule One: You can't talk like a normal teenager, all your talking has to be that of a three year old or younger."
"Rule Two," Zatanna continued, "you can't do anything for yourself, you have to ask one of us."
"Rule Three is pretty obvious," Wally interrupted, "the bathroom is strictly off limits, diaper use only."
"We will check you for changing and change you when we think you need it," Conner informed, "and throughout all of this, you need to listen to what we say."
"Finally, just relax," M'gann concluded, "this is to help destress you, let everything just happen and who knows, you might enjoy it."
"Well then, do you believe you are up to this task my friend?" Kaldur asked. There was a moment of silence from Dick until he took a deep breath and faced his comrades.
"Yes Big Bwother," Dick smiled, a small smile crept up Kaldur's lip at Dick's response, he was indeed cute.

"Ok, come with me little Robin, it's time to eat," M'gann cheered, picking up the boy wonder in her arms with little effort, partially due to Martian strength and partially due to her telekinetic powers, "and afterwards we can pick out your very first outfit." Dick blushed profoundly as he was being carried like a baby by the most maternal member of the team, Artemis was right when she said he would be incredibly embarrassed at first. After Dick had porridge fed to him, which was demeaning on it's own, M'gann actually burped him, something he hopes Wally NEVER learns about. M'gann walked into a room and placed Dick on the carpeted floor, she opened a drawer and pulled out three different outfits, the first was a blue Aquaman shirt along with brown pants, the second was a white shirt with long, yellow sleeves and a Kid Flash symbol at the front with the name Kid Flash at the back along with dark grey three quarter pants, the last outfit was a light blue digimon onesie with snaps at the crotch and a large picture of Agumon printed on the bottom left, the digimon logo was also printed at the back between where the shoulder blades would be. Dick blushed as he looked at the tree outfits, they all looked pretty embarrassing, eventually he pointed to the Kid Flash set.
"Dat one," he said, still red faced. M'gann almost died, it was too cute to see Dick pick out the Kid Flash one.
"Good choice, that will look so cute," Miss M cooed before grabbing the shirt and helping Robin into it, they had agreed to allow Dick to keep something over his eyes, even though they had seen his eyes while he was suffering from the night terror they still respected his desire to keep his identity a secret, Artemis and Zee found a super cute pair of sunglasses with Robin symbols on the two wings.
"There, you look adorable!" M'gann cooed as he looked at Dick in his Kid Flash outfit and childish glasses.

M'gann carried Dick back into the lounge room, where Conner had set up a play area for the boy, complete with giant lego and stuffed toys. Instead of placing Dick down however she took him out of the room and carried him to Wally's room.
"Wally, look at the outfit Robin chose." Dick tried to hide his embarrassed face as Wally turned around, a wide, goofy smile gracing his face upon seeing Dick in a Kid Flash shirt.
"Wow Rob, you have great taste in heroes," Wally cooed. M'gann passed Wally Dick before leaving the room to cook lunch. Wally cradled Dick for a few seconds before placing him down. "You're allowed to talk normally around me buddy."
"Thanks Wally," Dick smiled; Wally reached into the crib and pulled out the elephant plush before handing it to Dick, the boy hugged it tightly.
"So what do you think about everything so far?" Wally asked.
"So far it's not too bad," Dick replied, "I'd say I'm pretty whelmed." Wally smiled before lifting the boy into his arms.
"Well, let's go show everyone else your super cute outfit," Wally suggested, "and remember, back to toddler talk around everyone else." After Wally paraded Dick around the cave he placed the boy in the play area. Everyone seemed to go by their usual activities, M'gann was still cooking lunch, Artemis and Zatanna were watching cheesy romance films and Kaldur and Superboy were training. They all seemed completely oblivious to the diaper-wearing teen playing with large lego block in the lounge room, all except Wally. Wally had remained on the couch watching quietly over Dick since placing him down in the play area.
"You don't have to stay around, you can go do your own stuff," Dick reminded after the first two hours. In response Wally shook his head, smiling down at the ebony-haired boy.
"I want to be here in case you need anything," Wally informed, "and besides, you're super cute so it's worth sitting here for several hours." Dick rolled his eyes before returning to his lego. Another hour rolled past before Dick felt a large pressure in his stomach.
1411213321.title: Rules To Being A Baby

1412.content:
Option 1:
There are few things in this world that ensure certain chaos, a bored Klarion is one of them. The unamused Witch Boy decides to amuse himself by toying with his favourite play things. With no way of exiting the cave will the members of The Team be able to handle a hyperactive toddler with super speed?

Option 2:
While being a speedster is awesome there are a few downsides that Wally is less than willing to admit, one being that his food exits him as fast as he intakes it, not giving his weak bowel and bladder enough time to hold on fo him to reach a toilet, what would team think if they found out one of their members wore diapers?
1412.title: Kid Flash Ideas #1

choices: Zatanna fires on of her spells.
14121.content:
"Why does Nabu always have to ruin the fun!" Klarion complained loudly as he sat at the edge of a building with his legs dangling off. Teekl behind him meowed in response. "But I'm bored!" Klarion protested, being able to understand completely what his familiar was saying. "How can I entertain myself if I can't blow anything up?" Teekl once again meowed, causing Klarion to look down at the pedestrians walking far beneath him. "Yeah, but they're no fun, it's always the same thing, they panic, the Justice Dorks come and my fun is ruined again." Suddenly, Klarion perked up, he looked to his familiar as an evil grin crept up his face. "I just had a wonderful idea."

"So how long is this lock down going to be?" Artemis asked as she stood with the rest of the team in front of Batman and Red Tornado.
"Though it is an estimate, we can expect a minimum of twenty-four hours isolation," Red Tornado replied in his usual monotone voice.
"Wait, Zeta's going to be down for that long?" Robin asked, his eyes widening, "why?"
"We're testing out new Zeta Beam Technology," Batman informed, "which means that any use of Zeta beams could be fatal."
"But does that really require a lock down?" Miss Martian asked, not fully understanding Batman's motive.
"Usually no, but I can't risk some of you walking into the Zeta tubes accidentally or as some sort of prank," Batman replied, suddenly everyone turned to Robin and Kid Flash.
"I see you're point," Aqualad replied.
"Hey, what's that supposed to mean?" Wally complained in response.
"So does that mean Red Tornado gets to babysit us for a whole twenty-four hours?" Zatanna asked, cocking an eyebrow.
"No, I am needed on the Watch Tower," Red Tornado replied, "only the six of you will be here." Robin and Wally glanced at each other before wide grins appeared on their faces. Batman grimaced before turning to Aqualad.
"Try to keep some order in the mean time," Batman ordered.
"You have my word," Aqualad replied. Batman spun around and walked out, followed closely by Red Tornado.

RECOGNISED BATMAN ZERO-TWO RED TORNADO ONE-SIX

There was a few seconds of silence before the computer spoke again.

ZETA TUBES NOW OFFLINE

"Awesome! What should we do first?" Wally asked before racing into the lounge room, he was soon joined by the rest of the team.
"Batman doesn't want any thing broken when he returns," Kaldur informed, directing the information specifically to Wally and Dick.
"Come on Kaldur, we aren't that bad," Dick replied.
"Let's just keep things from going chaotic," Kaldur replied.
"And what's wrong with chaotic?" A voice rung, the team looked around themselves before Klarion appeared in a puff of smoke.
"Klarion!" Zatanna hissed.
"Hey kiddies, I was bored, so decided to come and entertain myself," the witch boy informed.

Klarion yelled as he shot a beam of dark energy at Aqualad. Robin ran up to Klarion and began throwing birdarangs at the lord of chaos. Klarion easily put up a shield to block the attack, as he was distracted with Robin Wally raced up and punched him directly across the face. Klarion staggered back a bit before realising what had happened. "You," he hissed, "you're the one who brought back Nabu." A wicked smile came to his face, Robin tried to throw a small explosive at Klarion but the witch boy only repulsed it back at the boy wonder, Robin was thrown backwards, hitting his head hard against the wall and falling unconscious. Finally, he turned to M'gann and his eyes started to glow like flames, M'gann dropped to the ground weak, her mind thinking that she was surrounded by fire. Suddenly, Wally was overcome by an incredible sense of fear, he whimpered and tried to go back more as Klarion approached, Klarion watched in amusement as Wally flooded his pants from fear. "That's perfect." With a puff of red smoke Klarion and Teekl were gone. Artemis, M'gann and Kaldur rushed to Wally as soon as their spells wore off.
"Wally, are you ok?" Artemis asked, kneeling down in front of the boy. His eyes were opened wide in perpetual fear as he mumbled something inaudible over and over again.
"What did Klarion do to him?" M'gann asked.

"Just my luck," Artemis sighed as she helped the mumbling Wally down the hall, his pants were really starting to stink of urine. She walked into the bathroom and began stripping Wally down, the carrot top was in far too much shock to care or help her. After stripping him down and turning on the shower she helped Wally in. "Come on Baywatch, what's gotten over you?" She had to pick up Wally to place him in the shower, he felt oddly light, she could have sworn he was heavier usually, and did he look a little shorter? Artemis shook it off and walked out of the bathroom to grab Wally some fresh clothes.

"Wally?" Artemis asked as she approached. She touched the young boy as he woke up, he looked up at Artemis and M'gann and then down at himself. Suddenly, tears began to form in his eyes.

1412121.content:
Artemis tried to cover her ears from Wally's constant crying.
"What the hell does he want?" Artemis yelled over Wally's crying.
"Shh Wally, don't cry, everything is ok," M'gann tried to sooth the boy again but to no avail this time.
"Ekam a eikooc raeppa ni ym dnah," Zatanna announced as a chocolate chip cookie manifested in her hand.
"Wally, please stop crying," M'gann pleaded as Wally continued to wail.
"Look Wally, I have a big chocolate chip cookie just for you," Zatanna cooed as she showed the toddler the cookie. Wally stopped crying and eyed the cookie for a moment before continuing to cry again. M'gann sat Wally down on the couch and kneeled down on the floor in front of him.
"What do you want Wally?" M'gann asked, "I can make you something to eat, what about your favourite brownies?" Wally didn't seem to stop crying as M'gann spoke.
"Me want Dick!" Wally shouted as he cried, everyone in the room froze and looked at Wally as he continued crying.
"You want what?" M'gann asked, seriously confused. Artemis burst out laughing at what Wally had said, that was not something she had expected to come out of a toddler's mouth.
"Me want Dick! Me want Dick!" Wally continued to cry. Suddenly M'gann was pushed out of the way as Robin brought Wally into a tight hug.
"It's ok pal, I'm here, shh, you're ok," Dick soothed the boy. Everyone watched as Wally stopped crying and curled into Robin's chest before falling asleep.
"Aren't you supposed to be asleep?" Zatanna asked.
"Between the crying toddler and Arty laughing there was no hope of that," Dick replied with a smirk.
"That was amazing Robin, how did you calm him down so quickly?" M'gann asked.
"I want Dick," Artemis recited, "he was talking about you, Dick's your real name isn't it?" Robin chuckled nervously.
"I guess Wally couldn't help spilling the beans as a toddler," Dick replied, "yeah, that's my name."

"Do we know how long this is going to last?" Dick asked as he sat at the table with everyone, a sleeping Wally on his lap.
"From what I know it could be permanent," Zatanna replied, Dick's eyes opened wide. "I may be able to find a spell to reverse the curse but I'm not entirely sure I have enough power to break something like this."
"What about Dr. Fate?" Kaldur asked, "could he return Wally to normal?"
"Maybe," Zatanna replied, a slight hint of venom in her voice, "but we have no way of contacting him."
"So we'll either have to figure this out on our own or wait for the Zeta Tubes to come back online," Artemis concluded.
"How hard could it be to take care of Wally for a day or two now that we have Robin here to calm him down?" M'gann asked. All of a sudden a foul smell filled the room, everyone turned to Robin would wore a slightly horrified, slightly disgusted expression.
"Did he just?" Artemis asked. Dick nodded.
"I think Wally and I should go take a shower," Dick stood up and walked out of the room with Wally, careful not to let any poo fall onto the floor.
"None of you would happen to have any diapers for toddlers handy?" Zatanna asked.
"Conner is at the skate park with Marvin and Mal," M'gann informed, "I could tell him to pick up some diapers for us."
"I thought none of us could go in or out of Mt. Justice," Zatanna replied.
"Conner has Sphere with him, he should be able to come in, but once he does he can't go back out so contact him quickly," Kaldur ordered.
"On it!" M'gann replied. She walked to a spacious part of the room and began floating as her eyes glowed green.
"Superboy, can you hear me?" She asked through a telepathic link. Conner watched as Marvin slid down the halfpipe and attempted to preform a 360 turn once in the air, to which he failed dramatically. Conner looked up as he heard M'gann's voice but soon realised it was a telepathic call.
"Yeah, I can hear you," he replied, "what's up?"
"Before you return to the cave I need you to go and buy some diapers for Wally, something that would fit a three year old," M'gann explained, Conner sat there for a moment, why in hell would Wally need diapers?
"I'm not even going to ask," he simply replied, "yeah, I'll get them."
"Hey Conner, check this out!" Marvin called over as he attempted another trick.
"You're gonna get yourself hurt!" Mal shouted to him.
"Awesome, don't forget the changing supplies and maybe some baby clothes as well," M'gann finished.
"No problem, love you," Conner replied as M'gann closed the link.

Wally stirred awake as Dick reached the bathroom.
"You up buddy?" Dick cooed, Wally looked up at Dick and smiled, he then sniffed the air as he face contorted.
"What's stinky?" he asked.
"Well, you kind of had an accident while you were sleeping buddy," Dick informed, Wally stayed quiet for a moment before beginning to tear up. "It's ok Wally, everyone has accidents from time to time." Dick quickly said before Wally could start crying.
"You don't," Wally reasoned, still upset.
"Yes but I'm a lot older than you are right now," Dick replied. He turned to shower on before stripping down and stepping in with Wally, he made sure to wash Wally thoroughly before washing himself. Once he was finished he dried Wally and wrapped the towel around his waist in a similar fashion to a diaper, luckily for him Wally didn't seem to have noticed. He then grabbed his own towel and dried himself before taking Wally's hand and walking with him to his room to get into new clothes.
"Dick, are you mad at me for being thwee and going poo poo?" Wally asked, looking at the ground ashamed.
"What? I would never be mad at you," Dick replied, he knelt down and placed a hand on the boy's shoulder. "You're my bro, I wouldn't be made even if you snuck into my bed at night and accidentally pooped." Wally giggled. "I care for you Wally so don't ever forget that." Wally hugged Dick tightly before allowing Dick to finish getting dressed. Dick lead Wally into the lounge room where Conner had returned, he looked at Wally and nodded, now understanding why M'gann wanted diapers for Wally.
"What's in the bag?" Wally asked pointing at the plastic bags Conner was holding.
"These are things I got for you," Conner informed.
"Weally?" Wally asked excited. Wally's face dropped when he saw what was in the bag.
1412121.title: Big Brother Dick

14121211.content:
"No! Me not weawing diapees!" Wally defied.
"Wally, you need them," M'gann informed, "it's ok, none of us are going to judge you for wearing diapers." M'gann glanced over at Artemis as she said that, the emerald archer rolled her eyes before crouching next to Wally.
"Yeah, don't think of them as diapers," Artemis told him, "think of them as battle gear to save you from the evil poopy monster."
"No! Not weawing them!" Wally, folded his arms defiantly and pouted.
"We don't have time for this," Conner picked Wally up with his free hand and carried him over to the table. Wally screamed and cried, trying to escape Conner's grip. "Wally you're getting into diapers one way or another," Conner informed, "you can just accept it or so help me I'll make you wish you had protection." Wally didn't stop as he continued to scream, intent on not getting diapered.
"NO! ME NOT WEAWING DIAPEES!" Wally shouted. "NO DIAPEES!"
"Maybe let me handle this," Dick said as he approached Conner. Conner eyed the younger boy for a second.
"As long as you don't give in to him fine," Conner replied as he passed Wally over. Wally stopped screaming and looked up at Dick, a glimmer of hope in his eyes.
"Dick, you won't make me weaw diapees," he pleaded.
"Wally, you've already had an accident," Dick reminded, "on me," he added. "So yes, you will need to wear diapers until we find a way to fix you." Wally soon returned to screaming and complaining. "Wally, this is your last warning, stop crying or we'll do this the hard way."
"NO!" Wally screamed loudly. Dick sighed as he picked up Wally.
"I really didn't want to do this," Dick sat down and laid the screaming boy across his knee, he took off the towel around the boy's waist and raised his hand, with a swift movement he slapped Wally across the butt. The boy stopped screaming and started brawling his eyes out. Dick continued with three more quick slaps before standing up and hugging Wally. "I'm sorry I had to do that, but you know not to argue with people older than you." Wally sniffled as the tried wiping the remaining tears on Dick's shirt.
"Sowwy," he sobbed.
"Now, will you let Superboy diaper you?" Dick asked, Wally nodded slightly.
"Good," Dick handed Wally over to Conner, who looked surprised at what he just watched, in fact, the whole team was surprised at how well Robin was able to handle Wally, they knew they were best friends but this wasn't something you prepare for.
"So, when did you become such a good parent?" Zatanna asked as Dick walked up to her.
"A few years back Wally and I went undercover as Daycare employees," Dick explained. A few minutes later Conner returned holding an upset Wally, the girls practically melted when they saw the cute red hair with large green eyes wearing a Kid Flash onesie over a very obvious diaper.
"You're soooo cute!" M'gann cooed. Wally pouted as he reached out to Dick, Conner handed him over before going to place the diaper supplies away.
"You're like a Baby Flash," Artemis cooed, Wally didn't seem to like that comment as he kicked his foot at her.
"Hey, do you think it's possible that Wally retained his super speed?" M'gann asked.

144.content:
Scott (Tyler Posey) and Stiles (Dylan O'Brien) are sitting, resting between scenes when their managers ask them if they want to do a commercial. The only draw back is that they both have to wear diapers, nothing else, just diapers. Stiles is up for it, but Scott hesitates saying "I've put on a few pounds and I need a pedicure". Stiles lifts Scott's shirt up and says "Dude, your abs look fine and as far as your feet, you play a werewolf, so your bare feet and toes are supposed to look gnarly". Scott replies "But that's with make up Stiles. You don't have make up applied to your bare feet every day, do you?".

Stiles talks Scott into doing the short commercial and walks over to the next sound stage. They are handed each a diaper and asked to change in the dressing rooms. Both of the young men take their diapers and change in the dressing rooms. Stiles comes out first wearing the diaper and socks on his feet. His chest is semi-tan and hairy as are his legs. Scott comes out wearing only the diaper. His tan body looks good as do his tan, semi-hairy bare feet. His toes are somewhat pedicured, but can use a touch up. "Your feet look fine Scott and the diaper looks good on you" Scott replies "What's with the socks dude, babies are bare foot, take them off!".
Stiles replies "I will when we get on the set, I don't like walking around barefoot and getting them dirty. I did that once and the director had a fit. The scene I had was laying on my bed studying with my feet Cris-crossed. After he said action, I walked in and laid down, Cris-crossing my feet. He yelled cut and said to me to wash my feet. The bottoms of them were black and grimy. Since then, I've worn socks for my barefoot scenes. Besides, the fans love to see my clean feet, not dirty ones.
Scott walks back and grabs his socks and puts them on, then walks with Stiles to the set.
They meet the director who explains the short shoot. After taking off their socks and walking barefoot on the carpet, Scott and Stiles sit down in front of a crib. They are given rattles and binkies to suck on. Stiles' bare feet are slightly less tanner than Scott's bare feet, but look just as good. "You boys sure take good care of your bodies and your bare feet!" the director says to them.

"When I say action, rattle the rattles and suck on the binkies. Stiles, spit it out and suck on your big toe. Scott, you see Stiles sucking on his big toe and try sucking on your toe, but can't. You grab his other big toe and begin to suck on it...okay?".
Stiles and Scott look at each other. Stiles says "Don't worry, I washed my feet this morning. My feet don't taste that bad". Scott replies "Thanks bud". Scott looks down at Stiles' bare feet and suddenly blushes.

"And...action!" the director yells. The two do exactly what the director asked. Stiles sucks on his own big toe and Scott grabs Stiles' other big toe and engulfs it into his mouth. Scott, at first, is unsure, but then gets used to it. He begins to really enjoy it. Stiles drops his own big toe and takes Scott's big toe and inserts it into his mouth and begins to suck on it. Scott nearly faints.
"and CUT...(the two actors continue their toe sucking)...CUT I SAID" the director yells. Stiles takes Scott's big toe out of his mouth, kisses it and puts it down. Scott returns the favor as he takes Stiles' big toe out of his mouth except he kisses all of his toes.
"That was great guys you seem to enjoy that toe sucking a little too much. Stiles can you tuck your woody back into your diaper a bit. Your balls and woody keep poking out. Scott, can I have my assistant shave the tops of your bare feet and toes? They're a bit too hairy". Scott doesn't object as a make up person quickly shaves both of his bare feet and toes. "Much better!" the director says as he takes a close look at Scott's bare feet and toes.

"Let's do the scene again...ready...and action" says the director.
