145121.content:
"That has got to be the stupidest plan I've ever heard," Lee informed as the spies stood in front of a man in a costume resembling a groundhog.
"Yeah dude, I'm eleven and even I know that won't work," Tony added.
"My plan is perfect, this year on Groundhog day I will cause my army of groundhogs to rise and help me conquer not only America but the entire world!" he rambled. The four tweens looked on with blank expressions, why did they have to be sent on a mission with such a stupid criminal, his plan wouldn't work even if they didn't stop him, all he would do is humiliate himself.
"Well actually," Marc replied, slipping into his smarty-pants mode, "groundhogs are native only to the United States and Canada, therefore you physically couldn't overtake the world because there are no groundhogs anywhere else to conquer with."
"My plan will work!" the man yelled.
"You really didn't need to reason with the madman," Lee whispered over to his brother.
"Yeah, I think you just made him angry," Tony reasoned, the man leapt at Marc, who swiftly jumped out of the way, the spies separated and prepared for battle.
"If you aren't going to let me continue with my plans I'm just going to have to eliminate you!" the man yelled as he pulled out a small circular saw.
"This guy's crazy!" Lee yelled. The man ran towards Lee, laughing maniacally as he swiped the saw at Lee. The boy jumped back next to Marc.
"He means business, that's for sure," Marc added. The man pulled out a gun and started shooting at them, Megan shrieked as she ducked behind a pole just as a bullet ricocheted off it.
"I think this laughing stock just bumped up to an A-Level threat," Megan shouted to the others, the man continued shooting at the boys, Marc jumped out of the way and behind two empty oil drums, a bullet grazing his left arm.
"Marc, are you alright?" Tony asked, crouching next to him.
"Tony, get out of here," Marc ordered, "this guy's too dangerous and I can't let you get hurt, I would never forgive myself."
"No way, I'm not leaving you three!" Tony protested, "We're a team, the four of us need to stick together!"
"This isn't up for debate!" Marc shouted back, startling Tony, it wasn't like Marc to snap like he did, especially to Tony. "You're only eleven, and a Gamma level spy, the rest of us are Beta, we'll handle this."
"But..." before Tony could argue Marc shoved him through the door and jammed it with a plank, he turned back to the fight and tried to attack the man with the 'Super Coolio Freeze Gun' the man jumped out of the way and shot a few more bullets at the blue-clad spy, one bullet grazing his right leg.
"That's my brother you're shooting!" Megan yelled, she threw the 'Zygomorphic Zap Ball', the ball split in half, creating a string of electricity, the man jumped just in time to miss the electric rope as it wrapped around Lee. Megan jumped behind several boxes as bullets zoomed towards her.

"This is bad, we can't get close to him," Marc complained.
"Hey Squirrel man!" Everyone looked up at a small yellow-clad spy standing on a large stack of boxes.
"Tony! Get away!" Megan yelled.
"Don't be stupid!" Lee added.
"I'm not a squirrel I'm a groundhog!" the man shouted as he started shooting at Tony, Tony jumped into the air and dropped down, he grabbed several freeze disks and threw them at the man, the criminal dodged them but almost slipped on the now icy floor. He jumped to the exit and held a remote in his hands. "I've had enough of this, goodbye spies." He pressed the button and suddenly a mini explosion happened above Tony, the boy looked up as parts of the roof fell towards him. Everything changed to slow motion, he was too petrified to move and could see the debris slowly hurdling toward him, enough to crush his skull and/or burry him alive, either way this was the end. Suddenly he felt something, he was being pushed out of the way, he looked behind himself to see Marc taking his place under the falling roof.
"NO!" Tony yelled as he fell to the ground. Marc let out a blood-curdling scream of pain as the concrete buried him. Tears streamed down Tony's face as he scampered to his feet and started frantically scraping away the concrete, Lee joined him and they moved a large concrete slab off of Marc's body. Tony hugged Marc's body tightly as he wailed loudly. "Marc, please come back, don't leave me!" Megan covered her mouth in shock as she looked at her brother's body.
"He's not dead," Lee informed, scanning the boy with his eyepiece, "he's alive, only barely though, Jerry might be able to save him." The several hours that followed were the worst hours any of the spies had ever sat through, despite Jerry's attempts he couldn't send the other three home they refused to leave their brother if he wasn't sure to survive, instead, Jerry hypnotised their parents so they wouldn't notice their absence. Tony still hadn't stopped crying, it was his fault Marc was about to die, if he had just listened and gone back to the jet like Marc told him to they would probably have captured the villain and be happily eating dinner together. The others wanted to comfort their youngest brother but both were far too distressed to be able to comfort anyone. Eventually, Jerry walked into the waiting room along with a doctor, the three spies jumped to their feet.
"How is he?" Lee asked.
"Will he survive?" Megan asked, dreading the answer. Jerry took a deep breath and sighed in relief.
"He is stable," Jerry informed, the three siblings hugged each other in relief. "Though I advised against it Marc is as stubborn as the rest of you, he wants to see..."
145121.title: One Wrong Step

1451211.content:
The eleven-year-old walked sheepishly into the room, Marc was lying on the bed wrapped in more bandages than a mummy. The injured boy looked at his younger brother and smiled in relief.
"Thank goodness you're safe," he sighed. Tony couldn't take it and broke down crying next to Marc. All his injuries and near-death encounter and THAT'S what he was worried about, whether Tony was safe or not, Tony's the reason Marc was even in a hospital bed in the first place, Marc should hate Tony, not be worried about him. Marc moved one of his arms and placed it on Tony's head, wincing as he did so. "It's ok Tony, I'm ok." He started rubbing Tony's head in a soothing way that the boy liked, Tony continued to cry by Marc's bed.
"I'm sorry," Tony apologised, "it's my fault this happened to you."
"You can't blame yourself," Marc replied, "please don't cry, I hate seeing you sad."
"I'm sad because I almost killed you!" Tony yelled, Marc started to get a little teary eyed as well.
"I don't want you to cry, I made the choice to jump and save you, it's my fault I wasn't able to get out," both boys cried as Tony hugged his older brother, trying not to hurt him. Jerry walked in and tapped Tony on the shoulder.
"I think we should let Marc rest," Jerry suggested.
"Can Tony stay with me please?" Marc asked, "I won't be able to sleep unless he's with me." That was partially true, Marc was always unable to sleep by himself in a room when he was younger, he needed Tony to be with him in the room. When Marc was scared, like right after watching a horror movie, Tony would actually need to sleep in the same bed as Marc to get the boy to sleep. Considering all the times Marc had to protect and stand up for Tony it made the eleven-year-old happy to be the 'protective big brother'. Jerry simply nodded, he had enough of a headache trying to argue with the kids already, he didn't want to get into another one, especially when it would be a detriment to Marc's health. He had another bed brought in and situated right next to Marc, Tony climbed onto it and held Marc's hand securely, the two boys fell asleep soon after.

Tony shifted in his sleep before opening his eyes, the room stunk, that was his first thought was as least. He rubbed the sleep from his eyes and looked at his brother, still sleeping soundly. He then realised what the smell was, urine, he quickly looked down at himself and sighed when he didn't see any wet marks on his bed or his shorts. He turned to Marc and lifted the blanket, seeing the front of his short completely soaked, being crushed probably did make your body do weird things afterwards like wetting the bed, he found it strange for Marc to wet the bed, he had never actually know a time before when Marc wet the bed, sure he knows he did, but it must have been before Tony could remember, he would have found it funny if he wasn't dripping from guilt. Marc began to turn as his eyelids slowly lifted up.
"How do you feel big bro?" Tony asked as the boy came to consciousness.
"I hurt all over," Marc replied sluggishly, "what's that feeling?" he looked under the blanket and gasped. "No, I couldn't have!"
"It's ok dude, considering you were recently crushed I don't think it's a big deal," Tony replied. Marc started to whimper and Tony jumped to his side.
"Don't cry please," Tony pleaded, "it's ok to wet the bed, I wet the bed all the time." Tony wiped the tears from Marc's eyes as the boy smiled.
"I'm afraid bed-wetting is the least of your problems," Jerry informed as he walked into the room. "While we managed to keep you stable and the WOOHP regeneration ray with have your bones healed in no time, the incident did irreversible damage to your bladder and bowels."
"Meaning?" Tony asked with a gulp.
"Meaning I won't be able to control when I use the toilet," Marc answered, tearing up again. Tony had to think fast, the last thing he wanted was for Marc to be sad, but the situation was pretty saddening.
"Hey, it's not that bad," Tony informed, "It won't bother me if you're diapered, heck, I'll even change you if you want." This didn't seem to help as Marc started to cry more.
"As if Lee didn't have enough reasons to pick on me, now I'll be the laughing stock at school and will have to quit being a spy," Marc wailed.
"I assure you your spy career is quite secure," Jerry replied, causing Marc to reduce to sobbing. "You are the brightest spy in WOOHP and one I can't afford to lose. Your predicament shouldn't pose too much of a problem. As for at school I have something that will help you." Jerry pulled out a large diaper and showed it to Marc.
"Uh, Jerry, this is exactly why Marc's going to be the laughing stock of the school," Tony informed, "Look at how bulky it is, even Marc's baggiest pants won't be able to hide it, he'll stick out like a sore thumb."
"Quite the contrary," Jerry informed, "the 'don't mess around diaper' is almost undetectable by anyone who doesn't know about it."
"So only the three of us will be able to see it if I put it on?" Marc asked.
"Not quite," Jerry replied, "it's not entirely undetectable, if you're only wearing it and someone is looking directly at you they will see it, if they only walk by you however they will think you're wearing pants. Same goes for the smell, when you..." Jerry cleared his throat, "to others who don't know about it they either won't smell it at all or think it was just someone passing wind."
"What about the diaper bulge?" Marc asked.
"The only way for someone to notice is if they were specifically looking for it," Jerry informed.
"Ok, so why does WOOHP even have something like this?" Tony asked, Jerry looked at Tony.
"Truth be told, it was made for you shortly before you joined," Jerry informed.
"Wait, what?" Tony asked shocked.
"You had a long history of diaper wearing and accidents before joining WOOHP, it was a counter measure in case you didn't outgrow that yet." Tony was ashamed and betrayed that Jerry would think he would actually need to wear diapers. Marc chuckled at his younger brother's red face, causing Tony to smile, he guessed if it made Marc laugh it was worth it.
"Thank you Jerry, but it's still embarrassing to wear a diaper, even if no one else will know," Marc informed.
"Don't worry Marc, I promise to look after you and take care of you," Marc looked at Tony, the boy was being genuine, "you've always been there for me so now it's my turn, I'll change your diaper when you need to and help you keep it a secret from the others."
"Perhaps keeping it a secret from everyone would be a bad idea," Jerry proposed, "it's not healthy and you would work better if you had more people to rely on. Then again, this is about you're personal issues and entirely up to you."
"Don't feel pressured to tell anyone if you don't want to," Tony told him. Marc smiled, he at least had Tony he would lean on for support.
1451211.title: Damage

14512112.content:
"Well, I guess it would be good to have a few other people who could keep the secret," Marc reasoned.
"Well that scratches out Lee," Tony scoffed, "he's about as good at keeping secrets than I am at resisting chocolate cookies."
"Actually, I was thinking about a certain three agents of WOOHP we affiliate with often," Marc informed, blushing slightly.
"Well in that case you're in luck," Jerry informed, "because 'a certain three agents of WOOHP' are here after learning of your latest mission, I'll let them in." Marc started to freak out, they were here now? Letting them know he was incontinent was one thing, having them actually see him right after he wet the bed was a completely different story. He didn't get a lot of time to get embarrassed, however, as a blonde haired girl ran in and hugged him tightly.
"I can't believe what happened," Clover announced, "I'm so glad you're ok."
"Are you feeling ok Marc?" Sam asked as she and Alex walked through the door.
"You actually came to see me?" Marc asked, shocked.
"Obviously," Alex replied.
"We care about you Marc, of course we want to know if you're ok," Sam added.
"Well unfortunately, Marc isn't entirely ok," Jerry informed, "Marc, if you'd care to explain." Marc lowered his head in shame.
"When I was crushed I was dealt permanent damage to my bowels and bladder," the three girls gasped, tears welled up in Marc's eyes. "I'm going to be incontinent for the rest of my life." Marc moved the blanket from over him, revealing the wet bed. The three girls flocked around him.
"That's awful, I'm so sorry Marc," Alex apologised.
"You're strong Marc, you can handle this, I know you can," Sam encouraged.
"Besides, you'll look super cute in a diaper," Clover squealed. "Though if I'm being honest, I imagine Tony would be the one diapered out of you four."
"Seriously?" Tony fumed, "why does everyone think I should be in diapers?"
"Don't worry little guy," Clover ruffed his hair, "it's just because you're so cute!"
"Thanks for being so supportive girls," Marc blushed, he wasn't used to getting this much attention from girls, especially girls as good looking and badass as Sam, Clover and Alex.
"We're here for you Marc," Sam replied, "and you'd probably want to keep this a secret so our lips are sealed."
"Indeed, the people in this room are the only ones who know about this and I'm sure Marc would like to keep it that way,"Jerry informed. "Girls, I have a mission for you that I'm certain you will be very interested in. The man who did this is still on the loose, we have tracked down his location and are ready to strike."
"We're going to make him pay for doing this to Marc!" Alex replied.
"Yeah, no one messes with our little friends and gets away with it!" Clover added.
"Don't worry Jerry, this crook is coming down hard," Sam concluded.
"Very good, then I suggest you get to work spies," Jerry walked the girls out of the room.
"Will they be ok?" Tony asked, watching them leave.
"They're Alpha level spies, the best of the best," Marc smiled in response. "Now, let's get this regeneration thing happening so we can head home."

Marc sat on his bed looking at the puffy diaper he held in his hands, he wasn't actually sure how to put on a diaper, he was too young to help diaper Tony when he was a baby and even when Tony was older he didn't want to help diaper him, a choose he instantly regrets.
"Fear not bro!" Tony cheered, "I'm here to help you!"
"What do you know about putting on a diaper?" Marc asked. Tony posed confidently, holding baby powder and cream.
"I did a bit of research on how to diaper a twelve year old, and did you forget, I wore diapers until I was nine," Tony reminded, it seemed he was too proud of the fact he knew something Marc didn't to be embarrassed that he wore diapers till he was nine, "so naturally I've seen Mum and Dad change diapers loads of times!"
"If you think so," Marc agreed unsure.
"Don't worry about it," Tony assured him, "now, lay down on the bed and lift your butt into the air!" Marc did as he younger brother commanded, Tony slid the diaper under Marc before applying all the product. Marc's face turned bright red, he couldn't believe he was being diapered by his younger brother, his whole private area was on display and there was nothing Marc could do about it unless he wanted to soil his pants. Tony on the other hand didn't bat an eye, sure it might be weird having to rub cream around your brother's privates but Tony was too focused on making sure Marc wouldn't get a diaper rash, he didn't want Marc to have to suffer any more than he already did. Tony finished skilfully taping on the diaper before making sure it was all secure and there wouldn't be any leaks. Once he was finished Tony placed the products on stands attached to a special diaper pail Jerry had given them, it would completely destroy the dirty diaper and replace it with a clean one instantly.
"Thanks Tony," Marc smiled.
"Hey Marc, Tony! We need to talk to you," Lee yelled as the door started to open. Marc and Tony started to freak out, Marc was currently on his bed, naked short of the diaper with his legs spread out, there was also a futuristic diaper pail next to his bed. Marc quickly threw the sheets over him and Tony pressed a button on the diaper pail, making it take the appearance of a normal bin. Lee and Megan walked in and looked at Marc, who was in bed, and Tony, who was at the desk reading a maths book.
"What are you two doing?" Megan asked, suspicious, if Tony was reading a maths book something was definitely up.
"I, um, need to get good grades at maths, otherwise, mum won't get me this game I want," Tony lied.
"Why are you in bed?" Lee asked.
"I'm a little tired from all that's happened recently," Marc informed, which wasn't in fact a lie.
"Well we're thinking of going out," Megan informed, "do you two want to come?"
"Hell yes!" Tony cheered, "going out beat maths any day!"
"What about you Marc?" Lee asked.
"I'll be out in a minute," Marc said.
"So where are we going anyway?" Tony asked.

"Are you really sure about this?" Jon asked, face red as he looked down at the clothes in his hands.
"Absolutely," Damian replied, as if it was obvious. "I've been investigating a string of robberies and I've traced them to a certain group of people."
"I understand that but..." Jon sighed, he really didn't want to say it out loud but there was no escaping it. "Do I really need to wear a diaper?"
"As a cover up the group seemed to be an ABDL family," Damian explained, "so yes, you need to wear the diaper, I need you to infiltrate their group and find out information from the inside."
"Isn't infiltration more your thing?" Jon asked, "shouldn't you be the one in the diaper?"
"First of all, I'm not wearing such infantile clothing," Damian informed, "and secondly, they only accept sixteen years and older, I'm only thirteen."
"I'm TEN!" Jon reminded, "I'm even younger than you!"
"But your Kryptonian physiology gives you the height of a sixteen-year-old," Damian explained, "with the fake ID I made you it won't be hard to convince them you're a teenager."
"I'm still not sure," Jon admitted.
"Don't be silly. Now, hurry up and get changed," Damian ordered as he pushed Jon into a seperate room. Several minutes later Jon emerged from the room, he was in nothing but a superman shirt that barely covered the pull-up he wore around his waist, Jon tried to pull his shirt down as much as he could to hide the undergarment. Damian looked at Jon in amazement before looking away, blushing profoundly, Jon was damn cute in nothing but a shirt and Pull-up.
"Damian, I've heard a lot of things about these types of groups," Jon revealed, "I'm scared, what if they do something to me like..." Damian grabbed Jon by the shoulders, rather roughly, shutting him up.
"I will be keeping a close eye on you," Damian informed, "I won't let anything happen to you, any sign of danger and I'll be in there within a split second." There was a moment silence before Jon hugged Damian tightly.
"Thanks Damian," several tears pricked the edge of Jon's eyes, "it means a lot to have you there for me." Damian couldn't help but shed a tear himself, though he promised himself he wouldn't he had grown attached the Jon, he saw him as a brother, not that he didn't have enough of them.
"Promise me that you'll at least try to stay safe ok," Damian asked, still hugging the boy tightly. A few moments the two broke a part. "Ok, now that you're ready it's time to head out, but first..."
